# **Joy Prokash Debnath**

I am a **computational biologist** working at the intersection of **transcriptomics**, **single-cell genomics**, and **machine learning**. Currently, I work with the **Genomics Team at [CHRF](YOUR_LINK_HERE_CHRF)** under **[Preonath Chondrow Dev](YOUR_LINK_HERE_PREONATH)** to build **R/Python** pipelines for **cross-platform DGE**, **biomarker discovery**, and **ML-based validation**.

I collaborate with **[AIBN, UQ](https://aibn.uq.edu.au/)** on **glycoRNA-based cancer biomarker** studies, and with **[BMU](https://bmu.ac.bd/)** and **[BUET](https://www.buet.ac.bd/web/#/)** on **HPV–HNSCC genomics** and **deep neural profiling** (VAE + Integrated Gradients).

Previously, I completed a **B.Sc. in Biochemistry & Molecular Biology** at **[SUST](https://www.sust.edu/departments/bmb)**, where I ran full **RNA-seq** workflows, **qRT-PCR validation**, and **feature-selection ML**. Ongoing projects include **[DeepFoldChange](https://github.com/Prokash21/DeepFoldChange)** (DL that emulates statistical DGE models) and **[omicML](https://omicml.org/)** (integrative ML platform for transcriptomic biomarkers, submitted to *Bioinformatics*).
